title: How to view someone else Instagram in Android phone - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, If you are using any android device then its very simple to download any Instagram profile pics. Follow My Simple Steps: Step 1: Enlarge - Insta Profile Pic Saver application must be installed on your device.  Step 2: After installation, launch it. Enter desired Instagram username.  Step 3: Touch "Show Photo" and you're almost done. The Instagram User Display Picture you have entered will appear.  Step 4: You can View/Zoom it now.  Step 5: Once you get the desired profile picture, then hit on Download this picture button. Your photo will be saved on phone gallery.
